title: Project 3: Web Scraping and Visualization
text:
Overview
In this project, I scraped data from the web using Python and created visualizations to present insights.


Skills Demonstrated

Web Scraping
Data Cleaning
Data Visualization



Key Code Example

# Import Libraries
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Scrape sample data
url = "https://example.com"
html_content = "<html><body><table><tr><th>Item</th><th>Value</th></tr><tr><td>Apples</td><td>10</td></tr><tr><td>Oranges</td><td>15</td></tr></table></body></html>"
soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, "html.parser")

# Parse table into DataFrame
table = soup.find("table")
rows = table.find_all("tr")
data = []
for row in rows[1:]:
    cols = row.find_all("td")
    data.append([col.text for col in cols])

df = pd.DataFrame(data, columns=["Item", "Value"])
df["Value"] = df["Value"].astype(int)

# Show DataFrame
print(df)

# Visualization
plt.bar(df["Item"], df["Value"], color=["green", "orange"])
plt.title("Sample Scraped Data Visualization")
plt.xlabel("Item")
plt.ylabel("Value")
plt.grid(axis="y")
plt.show()

      Item  Value
0   Apples     10
1  Oranges     15

title: Project 2: Linear Regression Modeling
text:
Overview
In this project, I built and evaluated a Linear Regression model using Python and scikit-learn.


Skills Demonstrated

Predictive Modeling
Model Evaluation
Data Visualization



Key Code Example

# Import Libraries
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression

# Create sample data
np.random.seed(0)
X = 2 * np.random.rand(100, 1)
y = 4 + 3 * X + np.random.randn(100, 1)

# Train model
model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X, y)

# Predict values
y_pred = model.predict(X)

# Model Coefficients
coef = model.coef_[0][0]
intercept = model.intercept_[0]
print("Coefficient:", coef)
print("Intercept:", intercept)

# Plot data and regression line
plt.scatter(X, y, color="blue", label="Data Points")
plt.plot(X, y_pred, color="red", linewidth=2, label="Regression Line")
plt.title("Linear Regression Fit")
plt.xlabel("X")
plt.ylabel("y")
plt.legend()
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()

Coefficient: 2.968467510701018
Intercept: 4.222151077447232

title: Reflection
text:
Throughout this project, I developed essential technical and project management skills.



Improved my Python coding practices, focusing on data analysis and machine learning.
Learned how to deploy static websites using GitHub Pages and Quarto.
Designed a professional portfolio website with responsive and modern layouts.





Initial setup issues with deployment and Git/GitHub.
Formatting and styling HTML/CSS for a clean design required careful attention.





Expand this portfolio with more complex projects.
Learn JavaScript frameworks like React.
Continue refining web design and UX skills.


Thanks for reading!
